articles.author: David K. Li, Jay Blackman
articles.title: FAA announces new air traffic control system in hopes of taming busy skies - NBC News
articles.description: The FAA will embark on an ambitious three-year plan to modernize America's air traffic control systems and phase out the "outdated technologies that are unable to meet" modern demands, officials said Thursday.
articles.content: The FAA will embark on an ambitious three-year plan to modernize America's air traffic control systems and phase out the "outdated technologies that are unable to meet" modern demands, officials said… [+4186 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Solender
articles.title: House GOP passes "Gulf of America" renaming bill - Axios
articles.description: It's the first time the House has voted to codify one of the president's executive orders into federal law, though it's unclear if the Senate will take it up.
articles.content:
The House voted Thursday to formalize President Trump's executive order to rename the Gulf of Mexico the "Gulf of America."
Why it matters: It's the first time the House has voted to codify one of t… [+1570 chars]

articles.title: T. rex’s ancestors may have walked from Asia to North America - Earth.com
articles.description: Researchers trace T. rex origins to Asia and megaraptors to Gondwana. Climate changes and predator extinction fueled their rise as predators.
articles.content: A new study led by UCL researchers has traced the roots of Tyrannosaurus rex back to Asia. Before ruling North America as a colossal predator, T. rex likely crossed a land bridge from Asia more than … [+4834 chars]
